senses.sense_definition: De cultureel bepaalde manier waarop mensen wonen en hun leefomgeving inrichten.

examples.text: De <w>wooncultuur</w> in Nederland wordt vaak gekenmerkt door grote ramen en veel lichtinval.

target_lang_translations.en: The <w>housing culture</w> in the Netherlands is often characterized by large windows and a lot of natural light.

examples.text: Door de jaren heen is onze <w>wooncultuur</w> sterk veranderd door nieuwe technologieÃ«n.

target_lang_translations.en: Over the years, our <w>living culture</w> has changed significantly due to new technologies.

target_lang_definitions.en: The culturally determined way in which people live and arrange their living environment.

en.target_lang_sense_clarification: societal and architectural approach to housing
